name: Sleigher (itch) (Nimbus Games)
description:
T'was the night before Christmas, when all through the house
not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse.

The toys that St. Nicholas made with all his little elves
Strewn among twelve shelves, as dark magic swells 

You, wake in a room full of magnificent parcels and sparkles
Twisted creatures lurking and stirring, some jostles and some garbles

Can you escape, break out, flee and take flight?
Before the insidious critters forever take you in the night.

Come check out our intern-made game. Merry Christmas Everyone!
